description: A customizable date picker component used to create date inputs. Adheres to WCAG 2.2 standards.

properties.name: bordered
properties.description: Indicates that the input should have a border.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the input.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the form control is disabled.

properties.name: feedback
properties.description: Feedback to render below the input.

properties.name: inputId
properties.description: The ID of the input element.

properties.name: inputTabIndex
properties.description: Determine the control's relative ordering for sequential focus navigation (typically with the Tab key).

properties.name: label
properties.description: The text to display within the label.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: required
properties.description: A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The date format for display and input.

properties.name: weekStartDay
properties.description: The first day of the week for the calendar display

events.name: inputBlur
events.description: Event emitted when the input loses focus.

events.name: inputChange
events.description: Event emitted when the input value changes.

events.name: inputFocus
events.description: Event emitted when the input gains focus.

events.name: calendarMonthChange
events.description: Event emitted when the calendar month selection changes.

events.name: calendarYearChange
events.description: Event emitted when the calendar year selection changes.

examples.basic:
<style>
        div[id^='story--components-forms-date--default'] {
          min-height: 400px;
        }
      </style>
      <modus-wc-date
        aria-label="Date input"
        ?bordered=${args.bordered}
        custom-class=${ifDefined(args['custom-class'])}
        ?disabled=${args.disabled}
        .feedback=${args.feedback}
        format=${ifDefined(args.format)}
        input-id=${ifDefined(args['input-id'])}
        input-tab-index=${ifDefined(args['input-tab-index'])}
        label=${ifDefined(args.label)}
        max=${ifDefined(args.max)}
        min=${ifDefined(args.min)}
        name=${ifDefined(args.name)}
        placeholder=${ifDefined(args.placeholder)}
        ?read-only=${args['read-only']}
        ?required=${args.required}
        size=${ifDefined(args.size)}
        .value=${args.value}
        week-start-day=${ifDefined(args['week-start-day'])}
      ></modus-wc-date>

scripts.title: Basic Usage
scripts.code: <modus-wc-date feedback="example-feedback" inputId="example-inputId" inputTabIndex="example-inputTabIndex" label="example-label" max="example-max" min="example-min" name="example-name"></modus-wc-date>

scripts.title: Event Handling
scripts.code: <modus-wc-date onInputBlur={(e) => handleInputBlur(e.detail)} onInputChange={(e) => handleInputChange(e.detail)} onInputFocus={(e) => handleInputFocus(e.detail)} onCalendarMonthChange={(e) => handleCalendarMonthChange(e.detail)} onCalendarYearChange={(e) => handleCalendarYearChange(e.detail)}></modus-wc-date>

storyExample.template:
<style>
        div[id^='story--components-forms-date--default'] {
          min-height: 400px;
        }
      </style>
      <modus-wc-date
        aria-label="Date input"
        ?bordered=${args.bordered}
        custom-class=${ifDefined(args['custom-class'])}
        ?disabled=${args.disabled}
        .feedback=${args.feedback}
        format=${ifDefined(args.format)}
        input-id=${ifDefined(args['input-id'])}
        input-tab-index=${ifDefined(args['input-tab-index'])}
        label=${ifDefined(args.label)}
        max=${ifDefined(args.max)}
        min=${ifDefined(args.min)}
        name=${ifDefined(args.name)}
        placeholder=${ifDefined(args.placeholder)}
        ?read-only=${args['read-only']}
        ?required=${args.required}
        size=${ifDefined(args.size)}
        .value=${args.value}
        week-start-day=${ifDefined(args['week-start-day'])}
      ></modus-wc-date>
